meanings.definition: A condition in which the bronchial tubes are permanently and abnormally widened.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that bronchiectases make it hard for air to flow through the lungs.
meanings.sent2: The hospital specializes in treating bronchiectases effectively.
meanings.sent3: Despite their name, bronchiectases don't actually involve insects in any way.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like bronchiectases, filling every corner.
meanings.sent5: The image of the tree with bronchiectases branches stuck in his mind.
